sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Purge the Hawk — remove a hardliner; shift policy toward negotiation.

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Settle Scores — purge collaborators; remove unrest in central circuits.

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Silence the Students — reduce unrest; increase legitimacy cost.

excerpt_zh: 置沿河巡察六使。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Patrol Inspectors — improve supply lines; reveal adjacent enemy stacks.

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二

summary_en: At Ma Jia Du near Jiankang, Du Chong's force is defeated; Chen Cui is killed, Yue Fei withdraws after Wang Jixie retreats prematurely.
excerpt_zh: 杜充遣都統制陳淬、岳飛等及金人戰于馬家渡，王曁燮以軍先遁，淬敗績，死之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

summary_en: The coup leaders Miao Fu and Liu Zhengyan are executed after capture and pursuit.
excerpt_zh: 辛巳，苗傅、劉正彥伏誅。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

design_notes: Card hook: Settle the Coup — restore stability; remove rebel modifiers.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

date.era: 建炎三年二月壬子至壬戌

summary_en: With Jin cavalry reaching the Yangzi, Gaozong evacuates via Zhenjiang and Pingjiang to Hangzhou, issuing a self-criticism edict en route.
excerpt_zh: 壬子…帝被甲馳幸鎮江府…壬戌，駐蹕杭州。…癸亥，下詔罪己。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

design_notes: Card hook: Retreat to the Lake — move seat; regain order in Jiang-Zhe.

excerpt_zh: 駕至平江，聞杜充敗績，上曰：『事迫矣，若何？』頤浩遂進航海之策。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十二 列傳第一百二十一 朱勝非 呂頤浩 范宗尹 範致虛 呂好問
sources.note: Lu Yihao proposes the sea strategy at Pingjiang.

design_notes: Event: Go by Sea — protect court; tradeoff: morale hit inland but supply resilience/coastal mobility buff.

date.era: 建炎三年三月癸未至甲申

summary_en: Miao Fu and Liu Zhengyan mutiny at Yangzhou, kill Wang Yuan, force Gaozong's abdication under Dowager regency at Xianning Temple.

design_notes: Card hook: Yangzhou Coup — paralyze court; spawn loyalist 'Qinwang' armies.

summary_en: Qu Duan clashes with Wang Shu over command in Shaanxi; despite victories, the feud leads to his removal after Pengyuan/Hezhou setbacks.
excerpt_zh: 庶召端… 不一見聽… 竟以彭原事罷端兵柄。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十九

design_notes: Card hook: Court Intrigue — on Song, trade Ops for Command disputes in Shaanxi.

date.era: 建炎三年四月戊申朔至辛亥

summary_en: Dowager returns power; Gaozong is restored, Jianyan reign-name resumed, mass pardons and structural reforms enacted.
excerpt_zh: 太后下詔還政，皇帝復大位…庚戌，復紀年建炎。…乙卯，大赦。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

design_notes: Card hook: Restoration — remove coup penalties; refresh cabinet.

summary_en: Facing Jin advances, the court resolves to take to sea from Mingzhou; mutineers resisting embarkation are executed as the fleet stages at Dinghai and Changguo.
excerpt_zh: 壬午，定議航海避兵…命呂頤浩等伏兵，執…十七人斬之。…己丑，帝乘樓船次定海縣…癸巳，帝次昌國縣。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

design_notes: Card hook: Sea Road — temporary safety; supply shift to coastal nodes.

chapter_title.en: Volume 373 Biographies 132: Zhu Bian, Zheng Wangzhi, Zhang Shao, Hong Hao

summary_en: Envoy Zhang Shao refuses improper rites and admonishes Jin on justice, is stripped of credentials and imprisoned at Mizhou’s Zuo Mountain stockade.
excerpt_zh: 至濰州… 見左監軍撻攬，命邵拜，邵曰：『…無相拜禮。』… 撻攬怒，取國書去，執邵送密州，囚於祚山砦。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百七十三 列傳第一百三十二
sources.note: Zhang Shao defies Jin protocol and is detained.

design_notes: Card hook: Unbowed Envoy — gain Legitimacy; risk Diplomatic Setback.

chapter_title.en: Volume 360 Biographies 119: Zong Ze, Zhao Ding

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二 宗望

summary_en: At night Yao Pingzhong attacks with 400,000; Zongwang's forces respond and smash the assault, re‑tightening the grip on Bian.
excerpt_zh: 姚平仲兵四十萬來襲… 分遣諸將迎擊，大破之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十四 韓世忠

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十二 列傳第十

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 劉豫

summary_en: Liu Yu is invested as emperor of Da Qi at Daming; state organs and capitals are established under Jin oversight.
excerpt_zh: 備禮冊命，立豫為大齊皇帝，都大名… 置丞相以下官。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五

design_notes: Card hook: Da Qi Installed — modify control/income in North China; diplomacy penalty with Song.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 昌(撻懶)

summary_en: Talan champions Liu Yu's enthronement as emperor of Qi under Jin suzerainty.
excerpt_zh: 撻懶力舉劉豫。豫立為帝，號大齊。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五

design_notes: Card hook: Elevate the Proxy — gain northern legitimacy; complicate diplomacy.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

summary_en: Wuzhu's southern column captures Hangzhou during deep raids below the Yangzi as the Song court flees by sea.
excerpt_zh: 丁亥，克杭州。… 宋主入于海。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

design_notes: Card hook: Into the Lake Country — sudden Jin pressure in Jiang–Zhe; Song coastal evacuation triggers.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十七/四十九/五十 食貨諸條

date.era: 天會八年至十二年暨後續

primary.name_zh: 河北、山東、河南、河東等路

summary_en: Issues route‑level tax and levy remissions for flood/drought and war damage, with posted notices and deadlines; moderates unrest while lowering short‑term income.
excerpt_zh: …以水旱免中都、西京、南京、河北、河東、山東、陝西去年租稅…所在揭榜諭之。（食貨二/四/五）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十九 食貨四
sources.note: Multiple route remissions in Tianhui years.

design_notes: Card: Route Remissions — when disaster flags set in listed routes, reduce unrest and increase loyalty at the cost of income for controller.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十三

summary_en: Jin restructures Henan governance: Zongyin serves as Henan Route Military Commissioner, then as Left Marshal’s Deputy, and Nanjing (Kaifeng) governor.
excerpt_zh: 為河南路統軍使，遷元帥左都監，除南京留守。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十三
sources.note: Appointments over Henan and Nanjing (Kaifeng).

design_notes: Jin admin event — bolsters control in Henan and Kaifeng; impacts diplomacy and logistics along the Huai front.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 劉豫

summary_en: Defector Xu Wen briefs Liu Yu and Jin on Song coastal logistics; plan proposes seizing Changguo's fleet and supplies, then striking Mingzhou and the Qiantang mouth.
excerpt_zh: 可先往昌國縣，攻取船糧，還趨明州城下，奪取宋主禦船，直抵錢塘江口。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五

design_notes: Card hook: Seize the Armada — create naval supply cache; temporary strike bonus on coast.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十三

summary_en: Jin establishes the Shandong Route Military Command to coordinate pacification and control; Zongyin is appointed as its head.
excerpt_zh: 八年，置山東路統軍司，宗尹為使。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十三
sources.note: Creation of the Shandong Route Military Command.

design_notes: Jin admin card: Route Command — increases pacification, improves levy and requisition in Shandong.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 宗弼本名兀朮…

summary_en: Assault on Heshangyuan fails; ambushed in defile, the Jin suffer a sharp setback against Wu Jie.
excerpt_zh: 宋軍陣于山口，宗弼大敗，將士多戰沒。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五

design_notes: Card hook: Mountain Trap — reduce Jin momentum on the Qin–Long line.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨上一（農田）

summary_en: Weir and polder repairs at Xuanzhou/Taiping (and the Yongfeng polder at Jiankang) restore acreage; counties assign polder rents to army stores, raising steady in‑region revenue.
excerpt_zh: 紹興元年，詔宣州、太平州守臣修圩。二年…以修圩錢米及貸民種糧，並於…常平、義倉米撥借。三年，定州縣圩田租額充軍儲。（食貨上一·農田）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨上一（農田）
sources.note: Weir/polder repairs and rent quotas to army stores.

design_notes: Card: Jiangnan Weir Repairs — controller of these prefectures gains increased farm yield and a military‑store rent stream.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨上一（農田）

summary_en: Offers discounted purchase and temporary tax abatements to convert official lands to private tenure, stabilizing rent payments and expanding the tax base.
excerpt_zh: 五年…承買官田者免物力三年至十年…已佃未佃並拘賣…承買荒田者免三年租。（食貨上一·官田）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨上一（農田）
sources.note: Purchase incentives and tax holidays tied to official land sales (early Shaoxing program).

design_notes: Card: Land Purchase Incentives — controller may convert official plots to private, gaining medium recurring revenue after a short ramp.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨上一（農田）

summary_en: Large-scale Taihu drainage and polder management (channels, gates, levees) restore submerged fields and increase assessed yields and rents.
excerpt_zh: …太湖者，數州之巨浸…常熟五浦…昆山…三十六浦…計用工三百三十餘萬…詔給錢米…又命並浚之。（食貨上一·農田）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨上一（農田）
sources.note: Taihu multi-portal dredging, levees, and periodic restorations raising cultivable area and rents.

design_notes: Card: Taihu Waterworks — if controlling Pingjiang/Changzhou/Jiangyin water network, gain increased farm yields (convertible to money); unlock flood mitigation.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨上一（農田）

summary_en: Launches broad sale of official lands across circuits to raise funds and regularize tenures; proceeds routed to granary and military needs.
excerpt_zh: 紹興元年，以軍興用度不足，詔盡鬻諸路官田。（食貨上一·官田）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨上一（農田）
sources.note: Shaoxing 1 edict to sell official lands.

design_notes: Card: Official Land Sale — one‑time money surge; unlocks follow‑up cards to convert rent streams to 常平/軍餉 depending on controller.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十六 本紀第二十六 高宗三

summary_en: Era changes to Shaoxing; major administrative reorganization of Jiang/荊湖 circuits and tax remissions to stabilize the south.
excerpt_zh: 下詔改元…復江、池路為江東、西路…置安撫司…蠲兩浙夏稅…

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十六 本紀第二十六 高宗三

design_notes: Card hook: Shaoxing Settlement — improve economy; unlock southern recruitment.

chapter_title.en: Volume 362 Biographies 121: Zhu Shengfei, Lu Yihao, Fan Zongyin, Fan Zhixu, Lu Haowen

summary_en: Facing Zhang Qi’s 50,000, Song commanders Yan Gao, Yao Duan, and Cui Bangbi form a coordinated line and smash the force outside Raozhou.
excerpt_zh: 張琪自徽犯饒州，有眾五萬… 閻皋、姚端、崔邦弼列陣以待… 大破之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十二 列傳第一百二十一
sources.note: Raozhou engagement vs Zhang Qi.

design_notes: Operation: Raozhou Sweep — suppress large rebel host; reduces unrest in Jiangdong corridor.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三百六十五 列傳第一百二十四 岳飛

summary_en: Using improvised rafts and clogging tactics, Yue Fei smashes Yang Mo's river fleet at E zhu, pacifying the lakes region within eight days.
excerpt_zh: 官軍乘筏… 舉巨木撞其舟，盡壞。… 果八日而賊平。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十五 列傳第一百二十四 岳飛

design_notes: Card hook: Break the Lake Pirates — secure logistics; improve river control.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三百六十一 列傳第一百二十 張浚

date.era: 紹興元年或二年（玉隆觀之戰）

summary_en: Zhang Jun smashes Li Cheng’s force at Yulongguan near Jiujiang–Yunzhou, coordinating cavalry and infantry to collapse the rebel line and roll up Jiangxi routes.
excerpt_zh: 存中率兵數千，首破賊於玉隆觀，追至筠州。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十一 列傳第一百二十 張浚
sources.note: Yulongguan action against Li Cheng.

design_notes: Card: Smash the Jiangxi Base — remove rebel control; temporary stability in Jiangxi/Huainan.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十六 本紀第二十六 高宗三

summary_en: Dowager Empress Longyou dies; court enters mourning and resumes governance under Gaozong.
excerpt_zh: 隆祐皇太后崩…群臣三上表，始聽政。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十六 本紀第二十六 高宗三

design_notes: Card hook: Mourning Court — restrict offensive actions; increase stability after rites.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

summary_en: Jin assault on Heshangyuan fails against Wu Jie and Wu Lin; a notable setback on the Qin–Long front.
excerpt_zh: 和尚原… 敗績。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

design_notes: Card hook: Mountain Pass Checked — reduce Jin momentum in the west; Song fortification bonus.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十六 本紀第二十六 高宗三

summary_en: At Heshangyuan, Wu Jie and Wu Lin decisively defeat Wuzhu's assault, securing the Qin–Long frontier.
excerpt_zh: 兀朮攻和尚原，吳玠及弟璘力戰，大敗之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十六 本紀第二十六 高宗三

design_notes: Card hook: Heshangyuan — boost northern morale; fortify mountain passes.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十八 志第三十 食貨三 錢幣
chapter_title.en: Vol. 48 Treatises XXIX: Fiscal III — Currency

summary_en: Rolls out small‑denomination scrip and mandates scrip usage in transactions above set thresholds; sets up exchange at regional treasuries.
excerpt_zh: …一貫以上皆用交鈔，不得用錢…小鈔通用…立庫易錢…（食貨三）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十八 食貨三 錢幣
sources.note: Scrip enforcement and exchange arrangements.

design_notes: Card: Scrip Enforcement — boosts revenue stability if controller holds scrip offices; may reduce trade if overused.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 劉豫

summary_en: Da Qi relocates its capital to Bianjing as Liu Yu consolidates administration under Jin aegis.
excerpt_zh: 阜昌二年，豫遷都於汴。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五

design_notes: Card hook: Move the Seat — adjust logistics and income nodes in central plains.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十二 列傳第十 銀朮可

summary_en: Yin Shuge is appointed Yanjing governor, then later retires honored; reflects Jin consolidation in the north after campaigns.
excerpt_zh: 天會十年，為燕京留守… 天會十三年，致仕。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十二 列傳第十

design_notes: Card hook: Northern Consolidation — stability in Yanjing; administrative capacity +1.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨上一（農田）

summary_en: Two Zhe and Huai circuits issue loans of seed and ox gear to resettle households and restore cultivation, boosting near‑term harvests and tax base.
excerpt_zh: 紹興二年…兩浙路收買牛具，貸淮東人戶。…四年，貸廬州民錢萬緡，以買耕牛。（食貨上一·農田）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨上一（農田）
sources.note: Seed/ox loans to restore agriculture in Liangzhe and Huai.

design_notes: Card: Seed & Ox Loans — on play, mark target prefectures ‘cultivated’ and grant a one‑time money bump, then modest recurring yield; available to any controller.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: Reinstates the special 'upright remonstrance' examination to solicit blunt advice and righteous candidates.
excerpt_zh: 詔復置賢良方正直言極諫科。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Speak Truth to Power — draw reform proposals; trade unrest for governance boosts.

chapter_title.en: Volume 373 Biographies 132: Zhu Bian, Zheng Wangzhi, Zhang Shao, Hong Hao

excerpt_zh: 虛中欲弁與正使王倫探策決去留… 弁請曰：『…今無節有印，印亦信也。願留印，使弁得抱以死。』金人迫弁仕劉豫… 弁曰：『豫乃國賊… 吾有死耳。』

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百七十三 列傳第一百三十二
sources.note: Zhu Bian’s seal-keeping and refusal to collaborate.

design_notes: Card hook: Hold the Seal — gain Diplomatic Credibility; resist Collaboration pressure.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: Creates the central 'Yuqian Zhongrui Army' with seven generals under the Ministry of War to tighten command.
excerpt_zh: 分崔增、李捧、邵青、趙延壽、李振、單德忠、徐文所部兵為七將，名御前忠銳軍，隸步軍司。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Centralize Command — improve activation control for one stack.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: The Hunan rebel Yang Tai swells in strength, styling himself 'Great Saint Heavenly King' and naming Zhong Xiang's son as heir.
excerpt_zh: 楊太眾益盛，自號大聖天王，立鐘相少子子義為太子。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Southern Uprising — spawn rebel units in Hunan; tie down Song forces.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: Institutes annual imperial review of prisoners to correct miscarriages of justice and calm unrest.
excerpt_zh: 親慮囚，自是歲如之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Justice Review — reduce unrest in two adjacent cities.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: Establishes the Imperial Armory Office to standardize weapons production for the front.
excerpt_zh: 置御前軍器所。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Imperial Armory — cheaper equipment; one-time supply bonus.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: Restores daily rotating remonstrance audiences following the Jianlong precedent to surface policy issues.
excerpt_zh: 手詔用建隆故事，命百官日輪一人轉對。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Daily Audience — draw 1 policy card; risk court intrigue.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: Establishes the Xiuzheng Bureau and puts Qin Hui in charge, elevating his influence over policy.
excerpt_zh: 置修政局，命秦檜提舉。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Xiuzheng Bureau — adjust policy sliders; strengthen peace faction.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: Temporarily abolishes the centralized transport authority, foreshadowing later reorganization.
excerpt_zh: 罷都轉運司。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Shake-up Logistics — immediate friction; sets up later efficiency reform.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: After a comet appears, issues a general amnesty and invites frank remonstrance; offers clemency to western defectors.
excerpt_zh: 以彗出，大赦，許中外臣民直言時政，陝西諸叛將許令自新。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Portents and Pardons — lower unrest; risk empowering rivals.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: Combines Fujian salt administration with the maritime trade office to consolidate coastal revenues.
excerpt_zh: 命福建提舉茶鹽官兼領市舶司。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Coastal Consolidation — improve port income; enable sea-lane logistics.

summary_en: Rewrites salt policy: raises Huai–Zhe salt tax and fully monopolizes Sichuan salt under central control.
excerpt_zh: 提轄榷貨務張純峻立淮、浙鹽法，增其算。總領四川財賦趙開初變四川鹽法，盡榷之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Salt Monopoly — +coin per turn; raise unrest in affected ports.

summary_en: Creates chief transport commissioners across Jiang-Zhe, Jinghu, Lingnan, and Fujian to centralize wartime revenues.
excerpt_zh: 初置江、浙、荊湖、廣南、福建路都轉運使。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Wartime Transport Corps — gain coin; improve supply along river routes.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: Unifies weights and measures empire-wide and forbids unauthorized tax markets to curb abuse.
excerpt_zh: 班度量權衡于諸路，禁私造者。… 禁州縣擅增置稅場。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Standard Measures — increase revenue reliability; lower corruption in one circuit.

summary_en: Under Zhang Jun's plan, Zhang Zongyan covertly crosses near Liuhe, hits Jin in the rear, helping force their withdrawal across the Huai.
excerpt_zh: 宗顏潛渡至六合，出其背。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十九

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

design_notes: Card hook: Pass Held — Jin offensive stalls; Song gains time to reorganize western forces.

summary_en: Wu Jie defeats Wuzhu at Xianren Pass, halting a major Jin thrust toward Hanzhong–Sichuan.
excerpt_zh: 吳玠…與兀朮戰于仙人關，大敗之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Close the Pass — fortify mountain routes; reduce Jin momentum in the west.

summary_en: Abolishes local exchange depots to reduce transaction inefficiencies and graft.
excerpt_zh: 罷諸州回易庫。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Cut Middlemen — modest revenue boost; lower corruption.

summary_en: Following Xianren Pass, Song counterattacks to retake Feng, Qin, and Long prefectures.
excerpt_zh: 吳玠敗金兵，復鳳、秦、隴州。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Qin–Long Recovery — reopen western recruitment; secure mountain supply.

summary_en: Yue Fei recovers Xiangyang and Yingzhou, crushing Qi garrisons and restoring control of the Han corridor.
excerpt_zh: 岳飛復郢州…李成棄襄陽去，岳飛復取之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Restore the Han Corridor — unlock northern marches for Song armies.

summary_en: Bans forced impressment of civilians into the army and orders release of those already seized.
excerpt_zh: 禁諸軍強刺平人為兵，已刺者皆釋之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: End Impressment — lower unrest; slight manpower penalty this turn.

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Xiangyang Circuit — improve supply and muster in the Han basin.

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

design_notes: Card hook: Rebuild the Han — reduce unrest; boost recruitment in reconquered areas.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十七 本紀第二十七 高宗四

summary_en: Borrows a tranche of funds from Jiang–Zhe markets to cover wartime expenses.
excerpt_zh: 借江、浙坊場錢一界，以備軍費。

excerpt_zh: 進軍朱仙鎮… 大破之… 金將多降。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十五 列傳第一百二十四 岳飛

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十四 韓世忠

excerpt_zh: 夜遣劉寶溯流… 金人扼其歸路，世忠知之，全師而還。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十四 韓世忠

sources.note: Fiscal relief and purchase reductions under Zheng Gangzhong.

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十九 本紀第二十九 高宗六

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十五 岳飛

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五

sources.note: Establishment of frontier trade marts (quechang).

sources.note: Arrival and installation at Longde Palace.

sources.note: Shaanxi boundary demarcation per Shaoxing settlement.

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三十 本紀第三十 高宗七
